trans-unit.source: Specifies additional event schema information for an event.
trans-unit.target: 指定事件的附加事件架构信息。

trans-unit.source: When you apply this attribute to an ETW event method defined on an <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource>-derived class, you must call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.WriteEvent%2A> method on the base class, passing the event ID, followed by the same arguments as the defined method is passed.
trans-unit.target: 当你将此特性应用于上定义的 ETW 事件方法<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource>-派生类，必须调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.WriteEvent%2A>方法的基类，传递的事件 ID，后面加上的相同自变量，如已定义的方法被传递。

trans-unit.source: You should follow the pattern shown in the following examples.
trans-unit.target: 你应遵循在以下示例中所示的模式。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventAttribute> class to define a variety of events.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventAttribute>类，以定义各种事件。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource>类。

trans-unit.source: The event identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 该事件的事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventAttribute" /> class with the specified event identifier.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的事件标识符初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor to specify events.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventAttribute.%23ctor%2A>构造函数以指定事件。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource>类。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the behavior of the start and stop events of an activity.
trans-unit.target: 指定活动的开始和结束事件的行为。

trans-unit.source: An activity is the region of time in an app between the start and the stop.
trans-unit.target: 活动是应用中开始和停止之间的时间区域。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventActivityOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventActivityOptions" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an additional event log where the event should be written.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应在其中写入事件的附加事件日志。

trans-unit.source: An additional event log where the event should be written.
trans-unit.target: 应在其中写入事件的附加事件日志。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置事件的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The event identifier.
trans-unit.target: 事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: This value should be between 0 and 65535.
trans-unit.target: 该值应介于 0 到 65535 之间。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventAttribute.EventId%2A> should be greater than 0 or less than 65535 or errors can occur in a tracing operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventAttribute.EventId%2A> 应为大于 0 或小于 65535 或可以跟踪操作中发生错误。

trans-unit.source: If errors do occur, you can get more information about the source of the error by checking the output stream of the debugger, if you have a debugger attached to the process firing events.
trans-unit.target: 如果错误发生，你可以通过检查输出流的调试程序时，获取有关错误的源的详细信息，如果你有一个调试器附加到激发事件的过程。

trans-unit.source: You can also look for errors reported in the ETW event stream, if you have an ETW listener on the event source where the error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果出现错误的事件源中有一个 ETW 侦听器，还可以查看在 ETW 事件流中，报告的错误。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the keywords for the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置事件的关键字。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventAttribute.Keywords%2A> property to define event keywords.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventAttribute.Keywords%2A>属性来定义事件关键字。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the level for the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置事件的级别。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the level for the event.
trans-unit.target: 指定事件级别的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventAttribute.Level%2A> property to specify event levels.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventAttribute.Level%2A>属性，以指定事件级别。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the message for the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置事件的消息。

trans-unit.source: The message for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的消息。

trans-unit.source: You can use standard .NET Framework substitution operators (for example, {1}) in the string).
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用标准.NET Framework 替换运算符 (例如，{1}) 在字符串中）。

trans-unit.source: They will be replaced with the string representation of the corresponding part of the event payload.
trans-unit.target: 它们将被替换的字符串表示形式的事件负载的相应的部件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventAttribute.Message%2A> property to specify event messages.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventAttribute.Message%2A>属性用于指定事件消息。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the operation code for the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置事件的操作代码。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the operation code.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定操作代码的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventAttribute.Opcode%2A> property to specify operation codes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventAttribute.Opcode%2A>属性指定操作代码。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventTags" /> value for this <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventAttribute" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取和设置此 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventAttribute" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventTags" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: An event tag is a user-defined value that is passed through when the event is logged.
trans-unit.target: 事件标记是记录事件时传递的用户定义值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventTags" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventTags" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the task for the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置事件的任务。

trans-unit.source: The task for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的任务。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventAttribute.Task%2A> property to define event tasks.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventAttribute.Task%2A>属性来定义事件的任务。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the version of the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置事件的版本。

trans-unit.source: The version of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的版本。
